title: Sweden's Volvo Cars scraps plan to sell only electric vehicles by 2030
content: The announcement means Volvo Cars follows in the footsteps of other industry players in scaling back its EV ambitions.
summary: The announcement means Volvo Cars follows in the footsteps of other industry players in scaling back its EV ambitions.

title: 'A declaration of bankruptcy': Unions lash out as Volkswagen weighs possible German plant closures

title: U.S. Steel shares drop more than 15% on report White House preparing to block Nippon Steel takeover

title: Job openings fell more than expected in July in another sign of labor market softening
content: The closely watched Job Openings and Labor Turnover Survey showed that available positions fell to 7.67 million on the month.

title: British luxury icon Burberry dropped from UK's FTSE 100 stock market index

title: Summer box office bounced back thanks to 'Inside Out 2,' 'Deadpool & Wolverine'

title: First France, now South Korea — Telegram's legal troubles are only growing. Here's why

title: Atlanta Fed President Bostic says officials can't wait for inflation to hit 2% before cutting

title: Nvidia $279 billion wipeout — the biggest in U.S. history — drags down global chip stocks

title: Mortgage refinance demand is 94% higher than a year ago, as interest rates fall again

title: Alibaba to allow payment through Tencent's WeChat Pay for the first time on e-commerce apps
